title: Alice in the Massacre - Novel Updates
tags: Amnesia   Artificial Intelligence   Child Abuse   Clones   Coma   Dark   Dead Protagonist   Death   Depictions of Cruelty   Dystopia   Fantasy Creatures   Female Protagonist   Flashbacks   Gore   Humanoid Protagonist   Identity Crisis   Monsters   Multiple POV   Mysterious Past   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Personality Changes   Psychic Powers   R-15   Special Abilities   Survival   Thriller   Tragic Past   Virtual Reality
author: Amane Kirika   天寧霧佳
description:
Blood, rust, and darkness reign in a nightmare land where an amnesiac girl awakens.

The misshapen entities who call her “Alice” assault her one after another.

Without a clue of what is taking place, the girl is forced to engage in battle.

She continues to struggle in her nightmare that she cannot wake up from.>
